name: Draw Me To Love
description:
#BrackeysGameJam

The boy is so in love with the girl, that he doesn't see the dangers and obstacles between them, worst of all he does that while he is in the friendzone kind of Sh...t!!!

Use your pencil and help the boy to reach the girl and maybe, if he collects all the hearts, to get her love him back!

PS: Sometimes on Chrome the music takes a few seconds to load, sorry about that.
